About this product
Overview
Strong oxidizing power of Ions for removing bacteria, virus and odors.Dry battery operation, can be freely used without AC power supply.Lightweight design, perfect fit for travel and business trips.4 AA size alkaline dry batteries last for 1 month (Recommend using Maxell's alkaline dry batteries).Package includes Hook and double-sided sticker for hanging or mounting No filter, easy to use without replacement
